description.author: Tim T.Y. Lin <timtylin@gmail.com>
description.description:
This package is a fork of @pandoc-citeproc@, intended to
support the development of Scholdoc. It is currently just a
trivial fork just so it can compile against
@scholdoc-citeproc@ without polluting the @pandoc-citeproc@
package and executable namespace.

This package is versioned identically to @pandoc-citeproc@.

For descriptions of the original @pandoc-citeproc@ package,
please visit
<http://hackage.haskell.org/package/pandoc-citeproc>

package-flags.name: small_base
package-flags.description: Choose the new smaller, split-up base package.

package-flags.name: embed_data_files
package-flags.description: Embed locale files into the library (needed for windows packaging)

package-flags.name: unicode_collation
package-flags.description: Use Haskell bindings to the International Components for Unicode (ICU) libraries
